metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0417 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: Heap-based Buffer Overflow GitHub repository vim/vim prior to 8.2.

notes.Note: ccdm94> this CVE involves code that was introduced in version 8.1.0105 of vim. Part of the patched code was introduced in version 8.2.3402, which is the fix for CVE-2021-3770. The vulnerability related to this other CVE also does not affect bionic and earlier.

criterions.comment: vim package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
